import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Bars3Icon, XMarkIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/solid' const Navbar = () => { // so, at first, our navBar is invisible. // once we use the handleClick function it sets the nav's usestate to the opposite, // which is true. const [nav, setNav] = useState (false) const handleClick = () => setNav(!nav) return ( // NOTES: brackets [] define custom limits.
{/* NOTES: p-2: padding all sides, px-2 or py-2 are padding on x and y axes */}
{/* NOTES: mr is "margin right." */}
